diff_act: 1.clearly indicate the disconnection to all remaining drivers in the call
3.initiate the addition of the controller to the multi-driver call
4.display the controller's identity in the lead cab

regen.absent_element: removal of controller from multi-driver call
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a clear indication when the controller is removed from the multi-driver call.

label: Functional identity of the automatically added controller shall be displayed in the leading cab.
absence: display the identity of the automatically added controller
